00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <math.h>
00003 
00004 /*
00005  *  Hilton's approximation to compute McIlwain's L-shell parameter:
00006  *   
00007  *          L^3 Bm / M = F( I^3 Bm / M )
00008  *
00009  *  This routine uses the F() function as described in 
00010  *  Hilton, JGR 76, No 28, 6952-6954, October 1, 1971.
00011  *
00012  */
00013 double  LFromIBmM_Hilton( double I, double Bm, double M ) {
00014 
00015     double  p, a1, a2, a3, X, X13, X23, F;
00016 
00017 
00018     p = 1.0/3.0;
00019     X   = I*I*I*Bm/M;
00020     X13 = pow( X, p );
00021     X23 = X13*X13;
00022 
00023     a1 = 1.35047;
00024     a2 = 0.465376;
00025     a3 = 0.0475455;
00026 
00027     F = 1.0 + a1*X13 + a2*X23 + a3*X;
00028 
00029     return( pow(F*M/Bm, p)  );
00030 
00031 }
00032

00035 /*
00036  *  Iterative inversion of Hilton
00037  */
00038 double  IFromLBmM_Hilton( double L, double Bm, double M ) {
00039 
00040     int     done;
00041     double  LHS, RHS, p, a1, a2, a3, X13, X23, X, a, b, c, d, I;
00042 
00043     /*
00044      *  we have;
00045      *   
00046      *      L^3Bm/M - 1.0 = ax^1/3 + bx^2/3 + cx 
00047      *
00048      *  or;
00049      * 
00050      *      LHS = RHS
00051      * 
00052      *  where;
00053      *   
00054      *      LHS = L^3Bm/M - 1.0 
00055      *      RHS = ax^1/3 + bx^2/3 + cx
00056      *
00057      *  Need to find X such that RHS = LHS
00058      *
00059      */
00060 
00061     LHS = L*L*L*Bm/M - 1.0;
00062     p = 1.0/3.0;
00063     a1 = 1.35047;
00064     a2 = 0.465376;
00065     a3 = 0.0475455;
00066 
00067 
00068     /* 
00069      *  Set bounds. Cant go any lower than 0.0 for X
00070      *  step until we have an upper bound
00071      */
00072     a = 0.0;
00073     done = 0; c = a;
00074     while (!done) {
00075     X = c; X13 = pow( X, p ); X23 = X13*X13;
00076     RHS = a1*X13 + a2*X23 + a3*X;
00077 
00078     if ( RHS - LHS > 0.0 ) done = 1;
00079     else if (c == 0.0 )         c = 1.5;
00080     else                    c *= 10.0; 
00081     }
00082 
00083     if ( fabs(a-c) < 1e-14 ) return( 0.0 );
00084 
00085 
00086     /* 
00087      *  We have a bracket. Zero in with bisection
00088      */
00089     done = 0; 
00090     while (!done) {
00091     d = c-a;
00092     b = a + 0.5*d;
00093 
00094     X = b; X13 = pow( X, p ); X23 = X13*X13;
00095     RHS = a1*X13 + a2*X23 + a3*X;
00096     
00097     if ( fabs((RHS-LHS)/LHS) < 1e-8 ) { done = 1; }
00098     else if ( RHS - LHS > 0.0 ) { c = b; }
00099     else { a = b; }
00100     }
00101 
00102     /*
00103      *  Take average of endpoints as final answer
00104      */
00105     X = 0.5*(a+c); I = pow( X*M/Bm, p );
00106     return( I );
00107 
00108 }

00117 /*
00118  *  McIlwain's original approximation to compute his L-shell parameter:
00119  *   
00120  *          L^3 Bm / M = F( I^3 Bm / M )
00121  *
00122  *  This routine uses the F() function as described in 
00123  *  Roederer's 1970 book, Appendix VI, page 155.
00124  *
00125  */
00126 double  LFromIBmM_McIlwain( double I, double Bm, double M ) {
00127 
00128     double  X, X2, X3, X4, X5, X6, X7, X8, X9, Y, G;
00129 
00130     X  = log(I*I*I*Bm/M);
00131 
00132     if        ( X < -22.0 ) {   /* X < -22.0 */
00133 
00134     Y = 3.0062102e-1 + 3.333389e-1*X;
00135 
00136     } else if ( X < -3.0 ) {    /* -22.0 <= X < -3.0 */
00137 
00138         X2 = X*X; X3 = X*X2; X4 = X2*X2; X5 = X2*X3; X6 = X3*X3; X7 = X3*X4; X8 = X4*X4; X9 = X4*X5;
00139     Y = 6.2337691e-1 + 4.3432642e-1*X + 1.5017245e-2*X2 + 1.3714667e-3*X3 + 8.2711096e-5*X4
00140         + 3.2916354e-6*X5 + 8.1048663e-8*X6 + 1.0066362e-9*X7 + 8.3232531e-13*X8 - 8.1537735e-14*X9;
00141 
00142     } else if ( X <  3.0 ) {    /* -3.0 <= X < 3.0 */
00143 
00144         X2 = X*X; X3 = X*X2; X4 = X2*X2; X5 = X2*X3; X6 = X3*X3; X7 = X3*X4; X8 = X4*X4; X9 = X4*X5;
00145     Y = 6.228644e-1 + 4.3352788e-1*X + 1.4492441e-2*X2 + 1.1784234e-3*X3 + 3.8379917e-5*X4
00146         - 3.3408822e-6*X5 - 5.3977642e-7*X6 - 2.1997983e-8*X7 + 2.3028767e-9*X8 + 2.6047023e-10*X9;
00147 
00148     } else if ( X < 11.7 ) {    /* 3.0 <= X < 11.7 */
00149 
00150         X2 = X*X; X3 = X*X2; X4 = X2*X2; X5 = X2*X3; X6 = X3*X3; X7 = X3*X4; X8 = X4*X4; X9 = X4*X5;
00151     Y = 6.222355e-1 + 4.3510529e-1*X + 1.2817956e-2*X2 + 2.1680398e-3*X3 - 3.2077032e-4*X4 
00152         + 7.9451313e-5*X5 - 1.2531932e-5*X6 + 9.9766148e-7*X7 - 3.958306e-8*X8 + 6.3271665e-10*X9;
00153 
00154     } else if ( X < 23.0 ) {    /* 11.7 <= X < 23.0 */
00155 
00156         X2 = X*X; X3 = X*X2; X4 = X2*X2; X5 = X2*X3; X6 = X3*X3; 
00157     Y = 2.0007187 - 1.8461796e-1*X + 1.2038224e-1*X2 - 6.7310339e-3*X3 + 2.170224e-4*X4
00158         - 3.8049276e-6*X5 + 2.8212095e-8*X6;
00159 
00160     } else {            /* X >= 23.0 */
00161 
00162     Y = -3.0460681 + X;
00163 
00164     }
00165 
00166     G = exp( Y ) + 1.0;
00167     return( pow( G*M/Bm  , 1.0/3.0 ) );
00168 
00169 
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*
00173  *  Inverse of above
00174  */
00175 double  IFromLBmM_McIlwain( double L, double Bm, double M ) {
00176 
00177     double  Y, Y2, Y3, Y4, Y5, Y6, Y7, Y8, Y9, X, H, f;
00178 
00179     f = L*L*L*Bm/M - 1.0;
00180     if ( f < 0.0 ) {
00181     return( 0.0 );
00182     } else {
00183         Y  = log(L*L*L*Bm/M - 1.0);
00184     }
00185 
00186     if        ( Y < -7.0 ) {    /* Y < -7.0 */
00187 
00188     X = -9.0176314e-1 + 2.999966*Y;
00189 
00190     } else if ( Y < -0.7 ) {    /* -7.0 <= Y < -0.7 */
00191 
00192         Y2 = Y*Y; Y3 = Y*Y2; Y4 = Y2*Y2; Y5 = Y2*Y3; Y6 = Y3*Y3; Y7 = Y3*Y4; Y8 = Y4*Y4; Y9 = Y4*Y5;
00193     X = -1.5035469 + 2.516886*Y - 1.5473094e-1*Y2 - 1.482533e-2*Y3 + 5.7665822e-3*Y4
00194         + 2.5165553e-3*Y5 + 4.6975588e-4*Y6 + 4.9336212e-5*Y7 + 2.8332675e-6*Y8 + 6.9447496e-8*Y9;
00195 
00196     } else if ( Y <  2.0 ) {    /* -0.7 <= Y < 2.0 */
00197 
00198         Y2 = Y*Y; Y3 = Y*Y2; Y4 = Y2*Y2; Y5 = Y2*Y3; Y6 = Y3*Y3; Y7 = Y3*Y4; Y8 = Y4*Y4; Y9 = Y4*Y5;
00199     X = -1.5035665 + 2.5166432*Y - 1.5579012e-1*Y2 - 1.6991733e-2*Y3 + 3.3726437e-3*Y4
00200         + 9.4374468e-4*Y5 - 1.6048742e-4*Y6 - 5.7606054e-5*Y7 + 1.6653982e-5*Y8 - 1.11444463e-6*Y9;
00201 
00202     } else if ( Y < 8.5 ) {     /* 2.0 <= Y < 8.5 */
00203 
00204         Y2 = Y*Y; Y3 = Y*Y2; Y4 = Y2*Y2; Y5 = Y2*Y3; Y6 = Y3*Y3; Y7 = Y3*Y4; Y8 = Y4*Y4; Y9 = Y4*Y5;
00205     X = -1.4921674 + 2.4799708*Y - 1.0499454e-1*Y2 - 5.6314931e-2*Y3 + 2.16412e-2*Y4
00206         - 3.9980282e-3*Y5 + 4.5340102e-4*Y6 - 3.2040569e-5*Y7 + 1.3002586e-6*Y8 - 2.3206968e-8*Y9;
00207 
00208     } else if ( Y < 20.0 ) {    /* 8.5 <= Y < 20.0 */
00209 
00210         Y2 = Y*Y; Y3 = Y*Y2; Y4 = Y2*Y2; Y5 = Y2*Y3; Y6 = Y3*Y3; Y7 = Y3*Y4; Y8 = Y4*Y4; Y9 = Y4*Y5;
00211     X = -1.3415203 + 2.5733781*Y - 2.747596e-1*Y2 + 2.9961512e-2*Y3 - 2.1911161e-3*Y4
00212         + 1.0870528e-4*Y5 - 3.5717807e-6*Y6 + 7.2957464e-8*Y7 - 8.0754426e-10*Y8 + 3.3797513e-12*Y9;
00213 
00214     } else {            /* Y >= 20.0 */
00215 
00216     X = 3.0460681 + Y;
00217 
00218     }
00219 
00220     H = exp( X );
00221     return( pow( H*M/Bm  , 1.0/3.0 ) );
00222 
00223 
00224 }
